    <item>
      <title>Red notification for tropical cyclone GEZANI-26. Population affected by Category 1 (120 km/h) wind speeds or higher is 1.529 million .</title>
      <description>From 06/02/2026 to 18/02/2026, a Post-tropical Depression (maximum wind speed of 211 km/h) GEZANI-26 was active in SWIndian.
